Key Match Events: Jose Iglesias hit a grounder up the middle to Perdomo's left, resulting in the game-winning run for the Mets.
Corbin Carroll's grand slam in the eighth inning on Wednesday night erased a late deficit.
Post-Match Reflections: Geraldo Perdomo reflected on not trusting his instincts, which he believes contributed to the loss.
Perdomo emphasized the importance of having fun and playing good baseball to get the win.
Manager Torey Lovullo highlighted the importance of playing good baseball and respecting every opponent.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The D-backs have dropped just their second series in their last 13, remaining in the lead for the National League's top Wild Card spot.
The D-backs trail the Dodgers in the NL West by 3 1/2 games.
